commit.message:
gimplify.c (gimplify_function_tree): Do not move the outer binds block.

2016-10-17  Richard Biener  <rguenther@suse.de>

	* gimplify.c (gimplify_function_tree): Do not move the outer
	binds block.

From-SVN: r241228
